Shop the latest and greatest styles at Gap with our new app! Reinvented from the ground up, it’s a must-have for shoppers on the go.
We made a few enhancements and fixed some bugs for a better app experience.
We made a few enhancements and fixed some bugs for a better app experience.

Save For Later: Not ready to take the plunge on that top but want to checkout with the rest of your items? No problem. Swipe left on the product in your bag, tap “Save For Later” and voilà: it’s moved to your saved items. Everything you’ve saved will be ready and waiting to join your wardrobe when the time is right.

Forgot Password: Forgot your password? We’ve got your back. In just a few simple steps, you can reset your password and login, all through the app.

Order History: We’ve expanded order history details to help you keep tabs on your orders. Order tracking isn’t in the app yet but we promise that’s coming in a future release.

Deleting Payment and Shipping Info: Planning a big move? Need to replace your credit card? Now in the app you can delete old info to make room for new shipping and payment info.

That’s all for now -- but we’re rolling out new updates all the time based on what you, the customer, wants. If you have ideas on what you want to see next, tell us by emailing mobileapp@gap.com.

Credit Card: Managing your Gap credit card through the app just got easier. No more web views - you can monitor your purchase activity, check your statements, pay your bills, and get push notifications related to your account, all in one native experience. You can even use TouchID to log-in to your card management account.

Product Sharing: See something you like but want a second opinion? Now you can easily share products with friends and family via email or messaging and social media apps.

Tap to Apply Promos: Love a good promo? Quickly add them to your bag with the tap of a button.

We’d love to hear your feedback - email us at mobileapp@gap.com anytime. We’re working on some exciting new features, so stay tuned for the next update!

Shop All Brands in One App: Miss shopping our sister brands? Well you’re in luck, because now you can easily switch between Gap, Old Navy, Banana Republic, and Athleta all in one seamless experience.

We read all your feedback, so email us at mobileapp@gap.com anytime and stay tuned for the next update!

Reserve in Store: Love something you saw in the app but want to try before you buy? No problem. Now, you can use the app to reserve items that are available in stores near you. We’ll hold anything you reserve for a day, and have it ready when you stop on by.

We read all your feedback, so email us at mobileapp@gap.com anytime and stay tuned for the next update!

Cardholders: We’ve made updates to make it easier than ever to see your Rewards and track your points. Just link your card in the Wallet section to check it out!

We’ve also made a few enhancements and fixed some bugs for a better app experience. Hit us up at mobileapp@gap.com if you have anything to share.

Cardholders: We’ve made updates to make it easier than ever to see your Rewards and track your points. Just link your card in the Wallet section to check it out!

We’ve also made a few enhancements and fixed some bugs for a better app experience. Hit us up at mobileapp@gap.com if you have anything to share!

Order Tracking: Check on the status of your orders, just in time for the holiday season! Simply go to your Account, tap on My Orders and click through to access your tracking number.

Checkout Updates: We've made it easier for you to confirm that your promos were applied and see when you've got Rewards and Bonus Cash to spend. Happy saving!

Holiday Theme: We’ve added some seasonal sparkle to make your shopping experience a little bit brighter this holiday season.

We’ve also made a few enhancements and fixed some bugs for a better app experience. Send us your feedback at mobileapp@gap.com. Happy holidays!

We’ve made some security and checkout enhancements and fixed some bugs for a better app experience.

Have ideas for new features or ways you’d improve the app? Send us your feedback at mobileapp@gap.com. Happy holidays!

We’ve fixed some bugs for a better app experience and made a few changes to checkout so that applying and removing promos, rewards, and bonus cash is as easy as pie.

Apps have New Year’s resolutions too. One of ours is to get more feedback this year, so tell us what you love, hate, or would like to see next at mobileapp@gap.com.

iPhone X Updates: iPhone X users, rejoice! We’ve updated the app to optimize your full screen shopping experience.

Per usual, we’ve also fixed some bugs and made some code updates for a better app experience. Hit us up at mobileapp@gap.com if you have any comments, suggestions, feedback or if you just want to say “hi.”

We’ve made some enhancements and fixed some bugs for a better app experience.

We’re all about personal growth. Send us your feedback at mobileapp@gap.com.

Barcode Scanner: Just for our store shoppers! Tap the Search icon to access our new barcode scanner. Scan to read reviews, see product availability, and view product details in the app.

Card Management Updates: It’s easier than ever to manage your credit card in the app. Tap Wallet < Manage My Gap Inc. Card and log-in with your card account info to see what’s new.

We’ve also made some updates to make browsing and getting to Bag easier, and we fixed some bugs for a better app experience. Have ideas for new features or ways you’d improve the app? Send us your feedback at mobileapp@gap.com.

Improved Filters: We’ve made some updates to address missing size filters. Select a department on the Filters screen to see the full filter options!

We’ve also made a few enhancements (try adding an item to Bag!) and fixed some bugs for a better app experience. Hit us up at mobileapp@gap.com if you have anything to share!

Sister Brand Update: A fan of our sister brand, Old Navy? Now you can buy your favorite Old Navy items online and pick them up in-store. Tap into Old Navy to check it out.

As always, we’ve also fixed some bugs and made some enhancements for a better app experience. Tell us the good, the bad, & the things you want to see next at mobileapp@gap.com.

Bonus Cash Access: Have of GapCash in your account? Now you can easily see when your cash is redeemable right on the Featured screen.

Product Recommendations: Find inspiration and see similar items via new product recommendations on each product page. Shop on!

We’ve also made a few enhancements and fixed some bugs for a better app experience. Hit us up at mobileapp@gap.com if you have anything to share!

Store Locator: Find your nearest store across any of our sister brands with our nifty new Store Locator. Tap into Account to try it out.

Gift Message: In time for gifting season! Add a gift message before you complete checkout and a gift receipt will be included with your order.

We’ve also fixed some bugs and made some enhancements for a better app experience. You have opinions, we want to hear them! Email us at mobileapp@gap.com.

Farewell holiday, hello 2019!  We’ve made minor updates and fixed some bugs for a better app experience. Let us know what you want to see next by emailing us at mobileapp@gap.com.

Bonus Cash Access: Have of GapCash in your account? Now you can easily see when your cash is redeemable right on the Featured screen.

Product Recommendations: Find inspiration and see similar items via new product recommendations on each product page. Shop on!

We’ve also made a few enhancements and fixed some bugs for a better app experience. Hit us up at mobileapp@gap.com if you have anything to share!

Better Order Tracking: Looking for your package? Now you can tap your tracking number and get information on where your order is within the app!

Bonus Cash Access: Have GapCash in your account? During redemption periods, now you can easily see and add those codes right in Bag.

We’ve also made a few minor enhancements to the Guest Checkout experience and fixed some bugs for a better app experience. Let us know what you think at mobileapp@gap.com.
We’ve made some minor enhancements and fixed some bugs for a better app experience.  Have thoughts to share?  Email us at mobileapp@gap.com.

Apple Pay is here! Don't have a Gap Inc. account but want to shop our brands? Now you can Pay with Apple Pay for any Guest orders that ship to an address (currently not available for Buy Online, Pickup In Store orders).

We’ve also fixed some bugs and made some enhancements for a better app experience. You have opinions, we want to hear them! Email us mobileapp@gap.com.

As always, we’ve also fixed some bugs and made some enhancements for a better app experience. Tell us the good, the bad, & the things you want to see next at mobileapp@gap.com.
